title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs with grated parmesan. Off heat, toss hot pasta with pancetta and egg-cheese mixture until creamy. Season with pepper and salt.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken (tikka) in a creamy tomato-based masala.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, grill until charred. Simmer tomato puree with spices, stir in cream, add chicken, and cook until flavors meld. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Veggie Stir-Fry
summary: Quick, colorful stir-fry with mixed vegetables and soy-ginger sauce.
instructions: Stir-fry veggies over high heat. Add soy, ginger, and garlic. Toss to coat and serve immediately.
